author: Jake Seiner
title: 'Surreal': Funeral homes struggle as deaths surge...
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Pat Marmo walked among 20 or so deceased in the basement of his Brooklyn funeral home, his protective mask pulled down so his pleas could be heard. “Every person there,...
content:
NEW YORK (AP) Pat Marmo walked among 20 or so deceased in the basement of his Brooklyn funeral home, his protective mask pulled down so his pleas could be heard.
Every person there, theyre not a body, he said. Theyre a father, theyre a mother, theyre a grand… [+5283 chars]
